DOC.brief_summary: A Multi-center , Randomized , double-blind , active-controlled , phase 3 trial evaluate safety efficacy Metformin/Atorvastatin subject Type II Diabetes dyslipidemia .
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-center , Randomized , Double-blind , Active-controlled , Phase 3 Clinical Trial Evaluate Safety Efficacy Metformin/Atorvastatin Combination Therapy Subjects With Type II Diabetes Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Subjects Dyslipidemia Type II Diabetes 19 year later , men woman age 80 Pregnant woman , nurse mother subject agree assign contraception study Subject type I Diabetes Subject hypertension control treatment ( blood pressure > 180/110mmHg )
